'Cerai' dengan Garuda, Bagaimana Nasib Penumpang Sriwijaya?
07 Nov 2019, 07:49 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Kerja sama dengan antara PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk dan PT Sriwijaya Air retak. Imbas dari retaknya hubungan ini, operasional layanan untuk Sriwijaya bakal dihentikan.Hal itu berdampak pada penerbangan Sriwijaya yang berpotensi batal alias cancel. Bagaimana nasib penumpang?Terkait hal tersebut, Corporate Communication Senior Manager PT Angkasa Pura I (Persero) Awaluddin menjelaskan, saat ini pihaknya fokus pada proses penanganan penumpang. Dia bilang, imbas dari retaknya hubungan dua maskapai itu menimbulkan beberapa kemungkinan yakni pembatalan penerbangan (cancel flight), pindah maskapai (transfer operate) dan pengembalian tiket (refund)."Sesuai dengan yang tadi saya sampaikan kami fokus proses penumpang yang terdampak operasional tersebut. Apakah itu nanti ada beberapa alternatif atau transfer operate, apakah ada cancel flight, apakah refund semua tergantung operatornya yaitu Sriwijaya," ujarnya kepada detikcom, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dia menuturkan, saat ini memang ada beberapa penerbangan yang dibatalkan dan ditunda. Namun, dia belum bisa merinci lantaran menunggu laporan di lapangan."Terkait data itu penerbangan memang ada cancel, ada reschedule, jadi memang di bandara AP I," ujarnya.Kembali, pihaknya akan fokus terhadap penanganan penumpang. Pihaknya akan terus berkoordinasi dengan Sriwijaya."Kita fokus antisipasi dampak, tadi ada 3 kemungkinan apakah cancel flight, transfer operate operator lain atau refund. Kita lakukan antisipasi makanya koordinasi terus dengan pihak airlines terkait hal tersebut," tutupnya.Simak Video "Sriwijaya Bantah Pesawatnya Tergelincir: Roda Terblok Aspal Amblas"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)

'Divorced' with Garuda, What is the Fate of Sriwijaya Passengers?
Nov 7, 2019, 07:49 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Cooperation with PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk and PT Sriwijaya Air is cracked. As a result of this broken relationship, service operations for Sriwijaya will be terminated. This will have an impact on Sriwijaya flights that have the potential to cancel. What is the fate of the passengers? Regarding this matter, Corporate Communication Senior Manager of PT Angkasa Pura I (Persero) Awaluddin explained that his party is currently focusing on the process of handling passengers. He said, the impact of the relationship between the two airlines had several possibilities, namely canceling flights, transferring and returning tickets. "In accordance with what I have just said, we focus on the process of passengers affected by the operational. Whether there will be alternatives or transfer operate, is there a cancel flight, whether the refund depends on the operator, Sriwijaya, "he told AFP on Thursday (11/07/2019). He said, at present there were indeed several flights that were canceled and delayed. . However, he has not been able to elaborate because he is waiting for a report on the field. "Regarding the data, there are flights canceling, rescheduling, so it is at AP I airport," he said. He said he would continue to coordinate with Sriwijaya. "We focus on anticipating the impact, there were 3 possibilities whether cancel flight, transfer operate other operators or refund. We do anticipate so that coordination continues with the airlines in this regard," he concluded. Slipping: Wheel Blocked Asphalt Amblas "[Gambas: Video 20sec] (fdl / fdl)
